sentences: Sinulla on taidot, joista voisi olla hyötyä tässä työssä.
context: The Finnish word 'taito' refers to a learned ability or skill that has been developed through practice and experience. It can refer to practical skills (like crafts), professional abilities, or talents in various areas. Unlike some innate qualities, 'taito' emphasizes the acquired nature of the competence - something that can be improved with effort.
